name: Rat Attack (LoganPotter1453)
description: Try to avoid the rats for as long as possible in this co-op arcade game. This game was created in roughly a 5 hours as part of a rapid prototyping course and felt it should be published. Enjoy and feel free to leave feedback, also check out our socials linktr.ee/logan.potter & linktr.ee/gibsgibin.   :)
